game.name: Sid Meier's Civilization V: Gods and Kings
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Interact with new types of city-states, engage in new city-state quests and global competitions, and master exciting new systems for land and naval combat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Interact with new types of city-states, engage in new city-state quests and global competitions, and master exciting new systems for land and naval combat.
